lessons.title: Day 1 - Onboarding
lessons.description: Welcome to your height optimization journey! Learn the basics of posture and how it affects your height.

steps.title: Stretch 1: Forward Bend
steps.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and bend forward, reaching for your toes. Hold this position.

steps.title: Stretch 2: Cat-Cow Stretch
steps.description: Get on your hands and knees. Arch your back up like a cat, then dip it down like a cow. Repeat the motion.

steps.title: Sleep Early Reminder
steps.prompt: Time to wind down and get ready for bed.
steps.description: Getting adequate sleep is crucial for growth and recovery. Aim for 8-9 hours of quality sleep.

steps.title: Welcome to Your Height Optimization Journey
steps.text:
Welcome to GoTall! You're about to embark on a transformative journey to optimize your height potential.

This program combines proven techniques from posture improvement, stretching exercises, nutrition optimization, and lifestyle habits to help you reach your maximum height potential.

What to expect:
• Daily stretching routines
• Posture improvement exercises
• Nutrition guidance
• Sleep optimization tips
• Progress tracking

Remember, consistency is key. Stick with the program daily, and you'll see results over time. Your future taller self is waiting!

lessons.title: Day 2: Nutrition Fundamentals
lessons.description: Discover the key nutrients that support healthy growth and maximize your height potential.

steps.title: Nutrition for Growth
steps.text: Proper nutrition is essential for maximizing your height potential. Learn about the key nutrients that support healthy growth.

lessons.title: Day 3: Exercise Basics
lessons.description: Learn basic stretching techniques that can improve your posture and potentially increase your height.

steps.title: Stretching for Height
steps.text: Regular stretching can help improve your posture and potentially increase your height. Let's learn some basic stretches.

lessons.title: Day 4: Posture Basics
lessons.description: Master the fundamentals of good posture with video demonstrations, quizzes, and practical exercises.

steps.title: Introduction to Posture
steps.text:
Why Posture Matters
Good posture makes you look taller and feel better.

steps.title: Knowledge Check
steps.prompt: Which of these positions represents a neutral spine?

steps.title: Hold a Stretch
steps.description: Keep your back straight and breathe deeply.

steps.title: Check Your Posture
steps.prompt: Take a moment to sit up straight.
steps.description: A quick posture check can make a big difference.

lessons.title: Day 5: Advanced Stretching
lessons.description: Take your stretching routine to the next level with advanced techniques and consistent practice.

steps.title: Daily Tip
steps.text: Here's your daily tip for height optimization. Stay consistent with your routine and you'll see progress over time.

steps.title: Knowledge Check
steps.prompt: What's the most important factor for height optimization?

steps.title: Daily Stretch
steps.description: Take time to stretch and improve your posture.

steps.title: Daily Reminder
steps.prompt: Check your posture throughout the day.
steps.description: A simple reminder to maintain good posture.

lessons.title: Day 6: Nutrition Deep Dive
lessons.description: Explore advanced nutrition strategies and learn how to optimize your diet for maximum growth potential.
